item.title: Automated user-oriented description of emerging composite ambient applications
GEMOC Initiative
item.description: GEMOC is an open and international initiative that aims to coordinate and disseminate the research results regarding the support of the coordinated use of various modeling languages that will lead to the concept of the globalization of modeling languages.
